016package de.cuioss.test.jsf.producer;
017
018import jakarta.enterprise.context.ApplicationScoped;
019import jakarta.enterprise.context.RequestScoped;
020import jakarta.enterprise.inject.Produces;
021import jakarta.faces.annotation.*;
022import jakarta.faces.application.Application;
023import jakarta.faces.component.UIViewRoot;
024import jakarta.faces.context.ExternalContext;
025import jakarta.faces.context.FacesContext;
026import jakarta.inject.Named;
027
028import java.util.Map;
029
030/**
031 * Various JSF Producers for junit tests.
032 * <p>
033 * Reason: In the test context, we don't have a JSF implementation, which would
034 * provide equivalent producers.
035 * <p>
036 * It is designed as 'opt-in'. Use with {@code @AddBeanClasses}.
037 *
038 * @author Oliver Wolff
039 */
040@ApplicationScoped
041public class JsfObjectsProducer {
042
043    @Produces
044    @RequestScoped
045    @Named
046    FacesContext getFacesContext() {
047        return FacesContext.getCurrentInstance();
048    }
049
050    @Produces
051    @RequestScoped
052    @Named
053    ExternalContext getExternalContext() {
054        return getFacesContext().getExternalContext();
055    }
056
057    @Produces
058    @ApplicationScoped
059    Application produceApplication() {
060        return FacesContext.getCurrentInstance().getApplication();
061    }
062
063    @Produces
064    @RequestScoped
065    @Named
066    Object getRequest() {
067        return getExternalContext().getRequest();
068    }
069
070    @Produces
071    @RequestScoped
072    @SessionMap
073    @Named("sessionScope")
074    Map<String, Object> getSessionMap() {
075        return getExternalContext().getSessionMap();
076    }
077
078    @Produces
079    @RequestScoped
080    @RequestParameterMap
081    @Named("param")
082    Map<String, String> getRequestParameterMap() {
083        return getExternalContext().getRequestParameterMap();
084    }
085
086    @Produces
087    @RequestScoped
088    @Named("view")
089    UIViewRoot getViewRoot() {
090        return getFacesContext().getViewRoot();
091    }
092
093    @Produces
094    @RequestScoped
095    @ViewMap
096    @Named("viewScope")
097    Map<String, Object> getViewMap() {
098        return getFacesContext().getViewRoot().getViewMap();
099    }
100
101    @Produces
102    @RequestScoped
103    @HeaderMap
104    @Named("header")
105    Map<String, String> getHeaderMap() {
106        return getExternalContext().getRequestHeaderMap();
107    }
108
109    @Produces
110    @RequestScoped
111    @HeaderValuesMap
112    @Named("headerValues")
113    Map<String, String[]> getHeaderValuesMap() {
114        return getExternalContext().getRequestHeaderValuesMap();
115    }
116
117    @Produces
118    @RequestScoped
119    @InitParameterMap
120    @Named("initParam")
121    Map<String, String> getInitParameter() {
122        return getExternalContext().getInitParameterMap();
123    }
124
125    @Produces
126    @ApplicationScoped
127    @ApplicationMap
128    @Named("applicationScope")
129    Map<String, Object> getApplicationMap() {
130        return getExternalContext().getApplicationMap();
131    }
132
133    @Produces
134    @RequestScoped
135    @RequestCookieMap
136    @Named("cookie")
137    Map<String, Object> getRequestCookieMap() {
138        return FacesContext.getCurrentInstance().getExternalContext().getRequestCookieMap();
139    }
140}
